record.field: Renovation work at the YourCompany headquarters.
Installation of acoustic ceiling clouds and wall panels.
Modifications to the kitchen of the lunch room
Hello Admin, Can we discuss this? Having nicer chairs for managers doesn't sit right with me.
We have already discussed, and I stand by my decision.
Hello Demo, There is a change in customer requirement. Can you check the document from customer again. Thanks,
Ok, I have checked the mail, I will update the document and let you know.
Fine! Send it ASAP, its urgent.
The elevator's state leaves much to be desired on many levels, we might need to take steps to repair it.
This is not very uplifting, it would probably raise the expenses by a lot. 😕
I know, it's driving me up the wall.
Repaint the walls with the hex color #0FF1CE
Buy a gift for Marc Demo's birthday

function.name: rating_apply
function.eval: ([ref('project.project_1_task_4')], 5, 'PROJECT_3', None, 'Exactly what I asked for, thank you!')

function.name: rating_apply
function.eval: ([ref('project.project_1_task_2')], 1, 'PROJECT_4', None, 'There must have been some miscomunication, because the result is not quite what I had in mind. I would like to request some modifications.')
